tag.description: The tag the release will be created from [$CI_COMMIT_TAG]

ref.description: If tag_name doesnâ€™t exist, the release will be created from ref; it can be a commit SHA, another tag name, or a branch name [$CI_COMMIT_SHA]

assets.description: JSON string representation of an asset link (or an array of asset links)

description.description: The description of the release; you can use Markdown. A file can be used to read the description contents, must exist inside the working directory; if it contains any whitespace, it will be treated as a string

releasedAt.description: The date when the release will be/was ready; defaults to the current time; expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

milestone.description: List of the titles of each milestone the release is associated with (e.g. --milestone v1.0 --milestone v1.0-rc); each milestone needs to exist
